title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7845.2 - Review of responses to notice of commencement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7845.2 - Review of responses to notice of commencement

State Regulations

Upon receipt of any written submissions from interested
persons in response to the board's notice of commencement of the planning
proceeding, the board may revise the draft scope contained in the notice of
commencement of the planning proceeding or may identify additional issues or
policies which it intends to address in the planning proceeding. A list of any
such revised or additional issues or policies to be addressed shall be posted
on the State Energy Plan website. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7845.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
